Name: The Marionette 提线木偶
About the game: Synopsis: The youth who was imprisoned by his sister since childhood, summoned the kami on the third day after his sister disappeared, and left the room. However, he had never left the room, but he also noticed the strangeness in the room. Teddy bear who loves to eat grilled fish, magician who talks to himself, and all kinds of people held a banquet in the space. What is hidden at the end of the house? What is the truth buried in twelve years ago? The story of 'The Marionette' has been devoted to you for five years' project by the producer. Game mode: There are six endings in the game, divided into 2 laps, you cannot reach the true ending in the 1st lap. The 1st lap and the 2nd lap of the game are completely different game content, and the number of destination maps in the 2nd lap is twice that of the 1st lap. Please also pay attention. Gameplay and functions: This game is a role-playing game of exploration and solving puzzles, with chasing, and does not contain combat and online elements. After purchasing the game, the player advances the plot of the game by solving puzzles and appreciates the performance of the game. The whole process of the game takes about 4 hours. Operation method: Arrow keys to control movement Shift+arrow keys to run Z key survey/scene switching X key to open the menu/return Ctrl key to skip the conversation Precautions: This game has no horror elements, but there is a slight bloody picture, which may cause your discomfort.
